job.title: .Net Core Developer
job.description:
Job Summary:
We are looking for a .Net Core Developer (Knowledge from development to deployment) to build software using languages and technologies of the .NET Core framework. You will create applications from scratch, configure existing systems, and provide user support. In this role, you should be able to write functional code with a sharp eye for spotting defects. Be a team player and excellent communicator. Also, passionate about the .NET Core framework and software design/architecture, They will bring experience building full-stack services and integrating them with the platform for a resilient, market-leading consumer-facing application. 

Roles & Responsibilities:
● Write clean, scalable code using .NET Core programming languages
● Test and deploy applications and systems
● Revise, update, refactor, and debug code
● Improve existing software
● Develop documentation throughout the software development life cycle (SDLC)
● Serve as an expert on applications and provide technical support

Qualifications:
● Minimum of 5+ years experience in .Net Core with C# (Middleware concept)
● Good understanding of the OOPs concept and TypeScript/JavaScript
● Experience in MVC and Rest API (development using. net core)
● Hands-on experience with SQL Server database
● Experience with Entity Framework & LINQ
● Azure (Azure functions using .Net Core, API Manager, CI/CD Automation
● Agile approaches using Kanban
● Familiarity with MS D365 - customer service module and Unit testing
● Experience with Design/Architectural patterns

Competencies & Behavior:
● Excellent oral and written skills in English
● Creative talents and the ability to solve tough problems
● Ability to work across concurrent projects
● Ability to communicate effectively via multiple channels (verbal, written, etc.)
● Ability to pay attention to detail and accurately follow procedures
● Ability to collaborate with peers in various org

customFields.generatedDescriptionAI:
We are looking for a skilled .Net Core Developer to join our team for a long-term project of more than 6 months. The ideal candidate should have a strong background in .NET Framework, Microsoft SQL Server, LINQ, RESTful API, Entity Framework, MVC Framework, C#, and ASP.NET MVC.

As a .Net Core Developer, your main responsibility will be to develop and maintain .Net Core applications, ensuring high performance and responsiveness. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features, as well as troubleshoot and resolve issues in existing applications.

To apply for this position, please submit a proposal describing how you can contribute to the project. Additionally, we request that you include links to some of your past completed projects that demonstrate your expertise in .Net Core development.

We look forward to reviewing your proposal and discussing the project further.
